content.heading: HTTP Overview
paragraphs: HTTP enables client-server communication via request-response protocol.

content.heading: Common HTTP Methods
paragraphs: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS, HEAD, CONNECT, TRACE

content.heading: GET Method
paragraphs: Requests data, appending query in URL (e.g., /form?name=value):

content.heading: POST Method
paragraphs: Sends data in request body to create/update resources:
- Not cached, not bookmarked, no history
- No length limit, supports binary data, more secure

content.heading: Other Methods
paragraphs: - HEAD: Like GET, no response body
